name: the sims 4 cc scooter and sketboard for adult, kids, and toddler

description:
the sims 4 cc scooter and sketboard for adult, kids, and toddler is a game developed by waronkcc. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play the sims 4 cc scooter and sketboard for adult, kids, and toddler on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
